events.message: We have received the applicant's resume and cover letter for the Software Engineer position as of this morning.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department for a software developer role.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to handle the candidate's hiring process for the engineering team.
The initial screening call went well, with the candidate demonstrating strong knowledge of backend software development.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the technical challenges and company culture.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for the candidate next Wednesday at 10 AM.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's fit with company values and compensation expectations.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate aligning well on culture and benefits discussions.
An official offer letter was sent to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits reflecting their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and indicated eagerness to join our engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming their start date and readiness to begin onboarding.
Onboarding activities began, with orientation sessions and access to engineering systems provided to the new hire.
The hiring process is now complete; the new software engineer is fully onboarded and productive with the team.
